name: Train Harder
description: Made to fully exploit the HTC Vive Roomscale, Train Harder is a challenging sportive game where the player agility, endurance and accuracy will be put to the test.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core I7-3770 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 780 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Require an HTC Vive
